info.title: Directory Audits API
info.description: Represents the audit logs generated by various activities within the Microsoft Entra tenant.

get.description: Retrieve a list of directory audit logs generated by various activities within the Microsoft Entra tenant.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Show only the first n items.

200.description: If successful, this method returns a 200 OK response code and a collection of directoryAudit objects in the response body.

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add group' and targetResources/any(r:r/type eq 'Group' and r/id eq 'grp1')&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc

https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add group' and targetResources/any(r:r/type eq 'Group' and displayName eq '<Group Name>')&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc

examples.summary: which users the user user1 added to group grp1?

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add member to group' and initiatedBy/user/id eq 'user1' and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq 'grp1' and r/type eq 'Group')&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc

examples.summary: which users name@domain.com added to group grp1?

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add member to group' and initiatedBy/user/userPrincipalName eq 'name@domain.com' and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq 'grp1' and r/type eq 'Group')&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc

examples.summary: who added users to the group grp1

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add member to group' and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq 'grp1' and r/type eq 'Group')&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc

examples.summary: who was recently added to group grp1?

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add member to group' and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq 'grp1') and activityDateTime ge <TODAY-7d>&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc

examples.summary: who added user user1 to group grp1?

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add member to group' and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq 'user1' and r/type eq 'User') and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq 'grp1' and r/type eq 'Group')&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc

examples.summary: when user user1 was added to group grp1?

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add member to group' and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq 'user1' and r/type eq 'User') and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq 'grp1' and r/type eq 'Group')&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc

examples.summary: when was the last user added to group grp1?

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add member to group' and targetResources/any(r:r/type eq 'User') and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq 'grp1')&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc&$top=1

examples.summary: when name@domain.com was added to group grp1?

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add member to group' and targetResources/any(r:r/userPrincipalName eq 'name@domain.com') and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq 'grp1' and r/type eq 'Group')&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc

examples.summary: When was the group GroupName last modified?
When was the group grp1 last modified?
When Name Surname was added to GroupName group?

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/directoryAudits?$filter=activityDisplayName eq 'Add member to group' and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq 'user1' and r/type eq 'User') and targetResources/any(r:r/id eq 'grp1' and r/type eq 'Group')&$orderBy=activityDateTime desc&$top=1

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Retrieve a list of groups in the directory.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Show only the first n items.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specifies the properties to be included in the response.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Indicates whether the total count of items should be included in the response.

parameters.name: $search
parameters.description: A search expression to filter the results.

200.description: If successful, this method returns a 200 OK response code and collection of group objects in the response body. The response includes only the default properties of each group.

examples.summary: When Name Surname was added to GroupName group?

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Retrieve a list of users in the directory. This includes details such as user ID, display name, mail, user principal name, and other properties.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specifies the properties to be included in the response.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Indicates whether the total count of items should be included in the response.

parameters.name: $search
parameters.description: A search expression to filter the results.

200.description: If successful, this method returns a 200 OK response code and a collection of directoryAudit objects in the response body.

examples.summary: When Name Surname was added to GroupName group?

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

scopes.https://graph.microsoft.com/.default: Access Microsoft Graph using application or delegated permissions

id.description: The unique identifier for the directory audit log.

correlationId.description: The correlation ID for the activity.

activityDisplayName.description: The display name of the activity.

activityDateTime.description: The date and time when the activity occurred.

loggedByService.description: The service that logged the activity.

id.description: The unique identifier for the user.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

userPrincipalName.description: The user principal name of the user.

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the user.

app.description: The application that initiated the activity.

id.description: The unique identifier for the target resource.

displayName.description: The display name of the target resource.

Type.description: The type of the target resource.

displayName.description: The display name of the modified property.

oldValue.description: The old value of the modified property.

newValue.description: The new value of the modified property.

userPrincipalName.description: The user principal name of the target resource.

key.description: The key of the additional detail.

value.description: The value of the additional detail.
